label: 西周
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1829-97). Son of fief doctor in Tsuwano domain; student of Rangaku. Employed by Bakufu in Bansho-shirabesho; sent to study in Leiden, 1862-65; then Edo adviser. Later Meiji bureaucrat; specialist in Western law, military administration, philosophy.
